Title: Gruppeleder for salgsaktiviteter indenfor energiprojekter
RoleDescription: Vil du arbejde med salg indenfor energi og rdgivning og kunne du tnke dig at g foran i en sektor med fart p sammen med et mindre team? S er du mske den kollega, vi mangler!Vi sger en salgsprofil med en erfaring indenfor energisektoren til vores forretningsenhed Energy. Det danske el-system er i rivende udvikling, hvilket bde medfre komplekse udfordringer og spndende projekter. Vi stter en re i at vre engagerede i den bredygtige udvikling, der beskytter miljet og giver god forretningsmssig mening, i alt hvad vi gr. Vores ekspertise indenfor el og forsyning dkker alle aspekter af elproduktion, transmission og distribution samt markedsanalyse i alle faser fra analyse over programmering til drift af det frdige anlg.Om opgaverne Som en del af Projects & Projects management vil du indg i et professionelt fagmilj, hvor der er fokus p vidensdeling og det gode samarbejde.Du vil overordnet og sammen med teamet vre ansvarlig for at pleje og udbygge relationer til eksisterende kunder foruden opsgende salg i forhold til nye svel som eksisterende kunder, herunder at:sikre hensigtsmssige forretningsgange og procedurer i salgsarbejdet og i teamettilsikre tilbudsovervgning af relevante udbudsportalerledelse af teamet og sikre kontinuerligt kommunikation, s medarbejderne til enhver tid er kldt p til at udfre deres arbejdebidrage til forretningsudvikling og strategiudvikling/implementering i afdelingen.Din uddannelsesmssige baggrund er ikke afgrende, men har du en el- teknisk baggrund med erfaring inden for salg, eller en merkantil baggrund med erfaring inden for el-branchen, er det et godt udgangspunkt.Og vi forestiller os at du vil passe godt til jobbet, hvis du:har evnen til at opbygge langvarige kunderelationer og kan identificere nye forretningsomrderhar muligvis erfaring med salg af rdgivningsydelserhar et relevant branchenetvrkhar erfaring med offentlige udbudkan mundtlig og skriftlig dansk og engelsk p forhandlingsniveauhar erfaring med eller lyst til ledelse af et mindre teamDu er selvsagt en strk kommunikator og har let ved at skabe relationer og tillid til andre med din hje personlige trovrdighed. Derudover vil de vre en fordel hvis du har indsigt i el-tekniske lsninger indenfor transmission og distribution, men det er ikke et krav.  Jobbet vil ogs fordre transport i forbindelse med kundebesg og ligeledes til vores forskellige kontorer i Danmark, hvorfor krekort er et krav.AFRY er en international ingenir-, design- og rdgivningsvirksomhed med 18.000 dedikerede eksperter inden for infrastruktur, industri, energi og digitalisering. I Danmark er vi omkring 850 kollegaer, der arbejder med byggeri, transport, procesindustri, pharmaindustri, automation, energi og arkitektur.Vi er et af Nordens strste ingenirhuse og stter rammerne for en god arbejdsplads, hvor der er tid til at udvikle din faglighed gennem projekter fra A-Z. Vi samarbejder p tvrs af fag og landegrnser, og giver dig rig mulighed for at accelerere din karriere.Sparring, feedback og teamwork er ngleord i vores daglige arbejde, hvor digitalisering og bredygtighed er strategiske pejlemrker.  Vi efterstrber en venlig og rummelig kultur med respekt for hinanden. Vi arbejder bevidst med inklusion og diversitet  hos os kan du vre dig selv. Og s er vi vilde med fleksibilitet, for der skal vre tid til alt det, der giver vrdi. Ikke kun p kontoret, men ogs i privaten. Af andre goder kan vi nvne:et stort tvrfagligt netvrk af kompetente kolleger at sparre meden god pensionsordning, en tryg sundhedsforsikring samt massageordningfamilievenlige og fleksible vilkren sund kantineordningaktive personaleforeninger og sociale arrangementer.Interesseret? Vi har kun behov for dit CV, men for at kunne beskytte dine persondata, kan du ikke sende det direkte p mail til os. I stedet skal du bruge linket her p siden, som ogs sikrer, at dit CV havner det rigtige sted og bliver behandlet fortroligt.Send dit CV til os snarest muligt, vi indkalder lbende til samtale og afslutter processen nr den rette kollega er ansat.  Kontakt Har du sprgsml til stillingen eller til AFRY som arbejdsplads er du velkommen til at kontakte Section Manager Emil Steenholt-Eliasson p telefon 51 67 78 94 eller Emil.S-Eliasson@afry.com. Thats how we're making future. We are actively looking for qualified candidates to join our inclusive and diverse teams across the globe. Join us in accelerating the transition towards a sustainable future.

Title: Projektingenieur:in Konstruktiver Wasserbau / Ingenieurbau (Mensch*)
RoleDescription:
Du wirkst bei der technischen Abwicklung von vielfltigen Projekten und Planungsaufgaben unter Anleitung mitDu bernimmst die Objektplanung in den Leistungsphasen 1 - 9 in den Bereichen Konstruktiver Wasserbau / Ingenieurbau (Wehranlagen, Schleusen, Schpfwerke, Siele, Steganlagen, Kanle, Klranlagen)Bei Interesse ist auch die rtliche Bauberwachung Teil deines AufgabengebietesDu erkennst Projektzusammenhnge durch die Kombination von Wissen aus den Bereichen des konstruktiven Bauingenieurwesens, der Geotechnik und dem BaubetriebDu bist der Verfasser / die Verfasserin von komplexen ErluterungstextenNeben der technischen Planung ermittelst Du Baukosten und wirkst bei der Ausschreibung und Vergabe von Bauleistungen mitDu bercksichtigst und setzt relevante Vorschriften und Normen im Bereich des konstruktiven Wasserbaus / Ingenieurbaus umAls Teil eines interdisziplinren Projektteams aus Bauingenieur:innen, Umweltingenieur:innen und Bauzeichner:innen stimmst Du Dich stets mit unseren Fachabteilungen, externen Partner:innen und Behrden abBei Interesse bieten wir Dir die Mglichkeit einer gezielten Weiterentwicklung zum/zur Projektleiter:inErfahrung:
Du verfgst ber ein erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium des Bauingenieurwesens oder vergleichbarer Studiengang mit vertieften Kenntnissen im Bereich Massivbau / Spezialtiefbau / Bodenmechanik. Du bringst idealerweise einschlgige Berufserfahrung in einem der oben genannten Kompetenzbereiche mit (mind. 3 Jahre).Fhigkeiten:
Idealerweise hast Du bereits erste Erfahrungen in der Objektplanung sammeln knnen. Du beherrschst MS-Office-Programme und hast Kenntnisse mit AVA-Programmen wie RIB iTwo und CAD-Programmen wie AutoCAD. Du bringst sehr gute (mindestens C1) Deutschkenntnisse sowie idealerweise einen Fhrerschein der Klasse B mit.Mindset:
Du bist nicht nur ein Teamplayer, sondern auch jemand, der mitdenkt, Verantwortung bernimmt und Dinge vorantreibt. Selbststndiges Arbeiten und ein hohes Ma an Engagement zeichnen dich aus.Du bist Teil spannender Projekte, die ihren Fokus auf Ressourcenschonung setzenDurch standortbergreifende Zusammenarbeit und vielfltige Netzwerkmglichkeiten, kannst Du Dein Wissen erweitern und von den Erfahrungen anderer profitierenBei uns kannst Du flexible Arbeitsbedingungen genieen, so sind Beruf und Privatleben optimal miteinander vereinbarWir bieten Dir eine individuelle Einarbeitung und ein angepasstes Buddy-Programm, damit Du Dich schnell in Deinem neuen Team zurechtfindestFr uns zhlt der Mensch als Ganzes. Deshalb bieten wir Dir ein umfassendes Gesundheitsprogramm an, welches Dich dabei untersttzt, fit und motiviert zu bleibenPasst nicht?
Die Stellenanzeige spricht Dich an, Du bist Dir allerdings nicht zu 100 % sicher, ob Dein Profil passt. Bewirb Dich trotzdem! Oder nutze die Chance zu einer Initiativbewerbung. So gehts weiter: Bewirb Dich direkt Online, indem Du auf den Apply now Button fr den fr Dich passenden Standort klickst. Hier gelangst Du in unser BewerberportalNutze fr weitere Fragen unsere direkten Ansprechpartner:innen aus unserem internen Recruiting-TeamNach Sichtung deiner Unterlagen und der Abstimmung mit dem zustndigen Fachbereich, melden wir uns schnellstmglich bei Dir zurckAnschlieend lernen wir uns per Microsoft-Teams oder direkt persnlich an einem unserer Standorte kennen und besprechen alle weiteren Einzelheiten.Du mchtest Wechseln? Das bleibt unter uns!

Title: FACTS and HVDC System Studies Specialist
RoleDescription:
We, within our competence and expertise, at AFRY are involved in shaping the future of the energy transition. The Transmission & Distribution (T&D) business area's strategy addresses the challenges of a changing power sector, upgraded grid infrastructures are instrumental in adopting the future generation mix to guarantee an economic and reliable power supply.Advanced Power Systems & Solutions is a vibrant team, part of the System Studies and HVDC section within T&D Sweden at AFRY. The team has a cross-functional role with a focus on FACTS (Flexible Alternating Current Transmission Systems), HVDC (High-Voltage, Direct Current) transmission system, Integration of Renewables, and other Advanced Power System Applications within Sweden, and Internationally. At present, the system studies and HVDC section consists teams within seven offices across Sweden.Integration of renewable energy along with FACTS and HVDC play a vital role in the development of sustainable transmission and distribution systems for now and the future. There is a growing need for advanced FACTS and HVDC systems around the world. Renewable electricity generation and demand continue to grow and the vision of higher penetration of Power Electronic Interfaced Generation will continue beyond 2030. We have the business mind of Making Future.We develop the system requirements for different utility and industry customers needs and also evaluate contractors and supplier submittals for both tenders and projects. You should be able to develop systems and solutions based on those system and functional requirements. We work together with our customers towards delivering sustainable techno-economic solutions in a timely manner is a core value for the team.You are experienced within the power systems analysis field and have MSc or PhD in the field of electrical power systems with at least 5 years of hands-on experience in this field. You are passionate about working with new and leading technologies and have a good knowledge of FACTS and HVDC systems.You have the knowledge and proven experience in simulation programs and power system tools.You must demonstrate excellent command in at least two of the following software programs and tools, PSCAD, PSS/E, DIgSILENT / PowerFactory, EMTP-RV, ETAP, MATLAB, Simulink, RSCAD / RTDS ...etc. Experience in CIM/CGMES is a plus.Being able to demonstrate a very good understanding of FACTS and/or HVDC systems within some of the following areas brings value to our offering and will be assessed during the application process:Dynamic performance optimization of the converter controls (e.g. grid forming and grid following control, black-start and network restoration, multi-terminal operation).Harmonic Impedance ScansSubsynchronous ResonanceSub-synchronous Torsional InteractionsControl System Interaction Control System DesignNetwork models developments, benchmarking, and validation Feasibility Studies and optimal allocation of plantsSelectivity study of a power systemDynamic Performance StudiesInsulation Coordination StudiesPower Quality Studies (Harmonic Performance, Flicker, ...etc)System Interaction Studies and ResonanceAC & DC Network IntegrationRTDS SimulationTo succeed in the role, you need your social and analytical skills, you are expected to be communicative with a powerful self-drive, results oriented and able to work independently in both AFRY premises and also at our customers. This means that you will be given opportunities to travel and commute within Sweden in part but also you can expect to have the opportunity to work with some customers overseas.We want a colleague that is business oriented and understand the sales and marketing business as part of being a consultant and hence you should be able to develop and drive credible and productive long-term relations with our customers and expand your business network.Fluent communication in English and good command of Swedish are required for this position. Good knowledge of other languages is a plus.In this recruitment process, we are handling your applications ongoing.
This means that the position may be filled before the advertising time has expired.
Therefore it is a good idea to submit your application as soon as possible, the expiring date is the 20th of September.If you have questions about the position, you are welcome to contact the responsible recruitment partner Maria Hansson, maria.hansson@afry.com, or the recruiting manager Mustafa Ibrahim, mustafa.ibrahim@afry.comWe are looking forward to your application!At AFRY, we engineer change in everything we do. Change happens when brave ideas come together. When we collaborate, innovate technology, and embrace challenging points of view. Thats how we're making future. We are actively looking for qualified candidates to join our inclusive and diverse teams across the globe. Join us in accelerating the transition towards a sustainable future.

Title: Rådgivende ingeniør VVS / Sivilingeniør VVS
RoleDescription:
VVS-avdelingen i AFRY er p utkikk etter dedikerte kolleger som har stort engasjement for VVS-faget og nsker  vre en del av et trivelig tverrfaglig milj. Som VVS-rdgiver i AFRY vil du f utfordrende og varierte arbeidsoppgaver.VVS-avdelingen bestr av 21 hyggelige og faglig sterke medarbeidere i Oslo, Trondheim, Lillestrm og Sandefjord. Vi er bredt sammensatt, med alt fra 2 til 47 rs erfaring og vi samarbeider tett p tvers av lokasjoner. Primrt sker vi n etter ansatte til vre kontorer i Trondheim og Oslo.I avdelingen vr jobber vi med alt fra komplekse industriprosjekter, kommunale formlsbygg, og hyprofilerte signalbygg til nringsbygg, hoteller og boligprosjekter.De fleste i avdelingen vr har hy kompetanse innen Revit, i tillegg har vi ekspertkompetanse fra BIM-avdelingen vr, som vi deler kontorlandskap med og har et tett samarbeid med.Arbeidsoppgavene vil omfatte prosjektering av VVS-tekniske anlegg, og kan vre alt fra mulighetsstudier og tidligfase til detaljprosjektering, oppflging i byggetid, og tilstandsanalyser av eksisterende anlegg. Vi har bde rehabiliteringsprosjekter og nybygg og forsker  sette sammen gode team som fr jobbe med det de liker og er best p.De senere rene har vi hatt hyt fokus p oppdragsledelse og kvalitetssikring og kontroll i prosjekter, og vi er opptatt av at du skal f en tett oppflging p dette.I AFRY er man del av et strre fagmilj hvor flere fag sitter samlokalisert. Dette gjr at vi kan samarbeide p tvers av alle bygg-relaterte fag i spennende prosjekter, i alle prosjektfaser. Vre medarbeidere er en god blanding av seniorer og juniorer i et uformelt milj, med flat struktur og gode sosiale ordninger for de ansatte.Kontorene i Oslo og Trondheim er nye og moderne og ligger sentralt plassert p henholdsvis Lilleaker/Lysaker i Oslo og Solsiden i Trondheim.Hvem er du? 
Vi sker deg som er ansvarsbevisst, selvstendig, og faglig engasjert. Du har erfaring som oppdragsleder og tar eierskap til dine prosjekter og er opptatt av at de skal lykkes konomisk s vel som teknisk. Du er lsningsorientert og er en god lagspiller for dine kollegaer. Gode skriftlige og muntlige ferdigheter i norsk er ndvendig.Vi ser etter deg med mastergrad fra hyskole/universitet, og med minimum 8 rs erfaring som rdgiver. Title: Minerals Processing Expert, Metallurgist
RoleDescription: Industry Division is seeking for a full time position for a Minerals Processing Expert, Metallurgist role. AFRY provides end-to-end expertise for the mining and metals industry, from early exploration and feasibility studies to mine design, processing, smelting, refining, and recycling. AFRY s metallurgical expertise covers minerals processing, hydrometallurgical and pyrometallurgical processes, materials technology and decarbonization strategies. Notable projects include various green and brownfield mines and concentrating plants, ferroalloy smelters, green steel mills, non-ferrous production plants and battery metal production plants globally.Minerals Processing Expert is expected to to reinforce our team serving a variety of mining and metals industries. The role is to act as a minerals processing technology expert and/or project manager in project development and execution phases of Clients investment projects. Ideally you would hold a qualified person status (JORC, NI43-101, PERC or similar) and be able to act as a QP in mining feasibility study projects. You would actively contribute to project sales, development of new solutions and ways of working. You have a background in mining / beneficiation technology, either in industry, consulting or engineering.You have experience in investment phase conceptual and feasibility studies regarding mining and minerals processing projects. Your understanding of mining and minerals processing covers throughout the mine value chain.Depending on your experience and skills profile, your tasks include sales management, proposal development, project management, lead / process engineering tasks as well as development in ways of working and client offering. You are fully supported by multi-skilled colleagues and our international project base provide an opportunity for further professional growth. We are committed to ensure your well-being at work and profound induction to our industry division.The position is located in Oulu or Vantaa organizations, but other AFRY locations can also be considered after the induction period.To succeed in this role, you have:Minimum 7 years hands-on experience of mining feasibility studies, minerals processing technology development, conceptual & basic engineering and project execution.Ability to act as in leading expert role in mining projectsDeep knowledge of the field and ability to provide practical client solutionsAbility to develop minerals processing concepts for different ore types including metallurgical test work programs.Ability to develop mass balance simulations using modern software like HSC Chemistry etc.M.Sc. education or higher in relevant fieldExcellent interpersonal and communication skillsAbility to develop new solutions, projects and approaches in a client-oriented mannerFluent communication skills in EnglishIt is seen as an advantage if you have: Understanding of JORC, NI43-101, PERC -code based economical and technical scoping- , pre-feasibility-, feasibility studies in mining industryQualified Person status (membership in organizations accepted within the international mining community as a reputable professional association. A list of foreign associations that the regulators consider to qualify as professional associations and the appropriate membership designation to qualify as a QP is set out in the companion policy to NI 43-101.)Geometallurgical test work knowhow is seen as an advantage.Why AFRY? As a stable and growing company, we provide you with a variety of opportunities to develop yourself. At AFRY you will have the opportunity to deepen your knowledge in finance, nice colleagues within your support and get to work together with the top experts in a dynamic and international environment.At AFRY we build a sustainable future together and develop sustainable solutions that serve not only our clients but also society. The work at AFRY is versatile, interesting, and challenging but at the same time flexible, allowing you to take care of your worklife balance. We apply flexible working in a hybrid model where possible, considering business needs.We strive to include all new employees in our work community from the first day at AFRY. We are brave, devoted team players, and we wish that you have the same mindset.Would you like to read more about your future colleagues careers? Get to know them on our web page: https://afry.com/en/join-us/get-know-usBenefits at AFRY All AFRY employees are supported with lunch, exercise, culture, wellness, and commuting benefit. AFRY employees are insured by private accident insurance when working remotely and in spare time. Employees have the right to receive help for taking care of a sick child at home.  The team player spirit strengthens in spare time in hobby clubs depending on the office location. AFRY employees spend time together in cross fit classes, golf clubs and board game clubs. We also encourage our employees to commute by bike. Employees with permanent contract are allowed to have a bicycle benefit to choose carbon neutral commuting. Morning porridge is offered to all cyclists at AFRY offices.
